headline.main: Under-Age Abortion and the Senate’s Bill (5 Letters)
headline.print_headline: Under-Age Abortion And the Senate’s Bill

docs.lead_paragraph: Booted from the top tier of competitive surfing five years ago, the Californian Rob Machado has found that living well is indeed the best revenge.

headline.main: Surfing Maverick Rides Solitary Wave to Success
headline.print_headline: Maverick Rides Solitary Wave to Success

docs.snippet: Booted from the top tier of competitive surfing five years ago, the Californian Rob Machado has found that living well is indeed the best revenge.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Senate Removes Abortion Option for Young Girls'' (front page, July 26): As a nurse practitioner who has been taking care of sexually active teenagers in New York City for 20 years, I can report that the senators who voted for this law got it wrong.

headline.main: Under-Age Abortion And the Senate's Bill

docs.abstract: Five letters comment on July 26 article and July 27 editorial on Senate approving bill to make it federal crime to help girls under 18 escape parental notification laws in their states by going to other states to obtain abortion; Edmund DeMarche supports bill; Prof Carol F Roye, Anna Bialek, Susan Stern and Jason Gerber oppose bill
docs.snippet: To the Editor:     Re ''Senate Removes Abortion Option for Young Girls'' (front page, July 26):     As a nurse practitioner who has been taking care of sexually active teenagers in New York City for 20 years, I can report that the senators who voted...

docs.lead_paragraph: Love — blinding, misguided love — I would like to believe, is the chief reason why so many mothers and fathers support parental notification laws for girls seeking abortions.
docs.snippet: Love — blinding, misguided love — I would like to believe, is the chief reason why so many mothers and fathers support parental notification laws for girls seeking abortions.
